author: jdillon
msg: The shell's console prompter and console error handler are now configured as components
Changed history to be set as a component now too (not autowired)
Added the shell and history as immutable variables for now until we revise the context apis

author: mturk
msg: Do a simple thread_join for a detached watchdog thread

author: reschke
msg: JCR-1769: add support for PROPFIND type allprop/include (see RFC4918), includes updates to client method impl and test case

author: jukka
msg: Inlined BatchedItemOperations.getOrCreateVersionHistory as it was already reduced to a single statement.
